original_title: Samsung accredited Sri Lanka’s Most Loved Home Appliance brand for 2023
original_body_lines: Samsung Electronics, the global leader in technology and innovation ranked Sri Lanka’s Most Loved Home Appliance brand by the world’s leading brand valuation consultancy – Brand Finance. Published in the LMD Brands Annual 2023, this prestigious list analyses Sri Lankan brands based on their value and strength.

The accolade highlights Samsung’s consistent efforts in delivering ground-breaking home electronics solutions that resonate with consumers worldwide reflecting its commitment to excellence, customer satisfaction, and its position as a frontrunner in the home electronics market.

Samsung has always been at the forefront of technological advancements, revolutionising the home electronics industry with its innovative products. The company’s unwavering commitment to understanding customer needs and providing cutting-edge technology has solidified its position as a trusted brand in households around the globe With a diverse portfolio of home electronics ranging from televisions, home appliances, audio devices, and smart home solutions, Samsung has consistently offered premium quality products that enhance everyday life. The brand’s ability to seamlessly blend functionality, style, and user-friendly interfaces has garnered widespread acclaim from consumers of all ages.

Receiving LMD’s Most Loved Brands award is a testament to Samsung’s relentless pursuit of excellence and its dedication to ensuring customer satisfaction. By continuously pushing boundaries and setting new industry benchmarks, Samsung has created a lasting impact on the lives of millions of people worldwide.

“We are incredibly honoured to be recognised as the Most Loved Home Appliance Brand in Sri Lanka by LMD,” said Samsung Sri Lanka Managing Director SangHwa Song. “This achievement is a result of our commitment to delivering exceptional experiences to our customers and our passion for innovation. We would like to express our sincere gratitude to our customers for their unwavering trust and support.”
